title: Malignant bone marrow disease: New hope for MPN patients

title_detail.value: Malignant bone marrow disease: New hope for MPN patients

summary: Myeloproliferative neoplasms (MPNs) are still difficult to treat. Researchers have discovered a new therapeutic approach that could fundamentally change this situation.

summary_detail.value: Myeloproliferative neoplasms (MPNs) are still difficult to treat. Researchers have discovered a new therapeutic approach that could fundamentally change this situation.
